Html:
Hi,

I'm looking for an option where I should be able to retrieve some set of messages which match a certain property value. For example: returning messages that have the subject line as "I am here"..

or messages that  were delivered after a given timesatmp ?

If there is no direct way to search a message based on the property, can you please suggest a better way than to iterate through all the messages and matching properties.
ignore the above. boost::make_filter_iterator will work for me.
